faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: Go to the Login page, click 'Forgot password', and follow the instructions sent to your email.

faqs.question: How can I contact support?
faqs.answer: Use the 'Contact Us' form or email support@example.com.

faqs.question: Where can I update my profile information?
faqs.answer: Navigate to Settings > Profile to update your name, email, and avatar.
